en.is_not_valid_origin_for: is not a valid derivation origin for
en.waiting_for_auth_data: Hang tight, connecting to the dapp
en.validating_auth_data: Hang tight, validating the dapp's information
en.invalid_authentication_request_received: It seems like an invalid authentication request was received.
en.connection_could_not_be_established: It seems like the connection with the service could not be established.
en.no_request_received: There was an issue connecting with the application. Try a different browser; if the issue persists, contact the developer.
en.auth_failed: Something went wrong during authentication. Authenticating service was notified and you may close this page.
en.auth_success: Authentication successful. You may close this page.
en.first_time_unknown_subtitle: Create an Internet Identity to connect to
en.first_time_alternative_of: You are creating an Internet Identity with
en.use_existing_alternative_of: Enter the Internet Identity that connects to
en.pick_alternative_of: Choose the Internet Identity that connects to
